mainEntity.name: How do I know what type of website my business needs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Start by identifying your goals. Do you simply need an informational site to highlight your services, or do you need advanced features like e-commerce, appointment booking, or lead-generation tools? At DePinho Design, we guide you through this process — ensuring your website fits both your immediate needs and long-term growth goals.

mainEntity.name: Why should I choose DePinho Design over other web design companies?

acceptedAnswer.text: We know comparing web design companies can feel like comparing apples to oranges — every agency promises results. What sets DePinho Design apart is our hands-on, boutique approach: we handle everything in-house — from design and SEO to hosting and ongoing support — ensuring consistency, accountability, and lasting value. Plus, our diverse portfolio covers industries from healthcare and finance to restaurants and trade services, giving us insight into what works across markets.

mainEntity.name: Do you provide ongoing support after my website launches?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. Your website isn’t a one-time project — it’s a living part of your business. We provide managed hosting, security updates, backups, SEO enhancements, and content maintenance to keep your site fast, secure, and performing at its best. Clients love having a single, trusted partner to manage all of it under one roof.

mainEntity.name: What’s included in DePinho Design’s website packages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our packages go far beyond design. Each includes custom-built layouts (no templates), premium plugins, WordPress and Elementor development, SEO and schema markup, and technical support. We focus on delivering long-term ROI with transparent pricing — no hidden fees, just measurable results.
